Title: Luther Braxton (No. 21)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jon Bokenkamp (teleplay by), John Eisendrath (teleplay by), J.R. Orci (story by), Lukas Reiter (story by), John Eisendrath (story by), Jon Bokenkamp (story by), Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: The task force tries to save Red when he's arrested and taken to a secret detention facility. At the facility, Red tangles with a thief with whom he shared a complicated history.
